title: Beautiful Betrayals
description: When Jillie learns of her husbandâ€™s secret life, lies and betrayals are front and center. A friend introduces her to a secret society and Jillie embraces the whip that was thrust into her hands to discover power, love and lust like she has never felt. Jillie finally finds freedom and truth as she beings her discovery of life and self. But it seems in a world of masks and props everyone has secrets to hide, even those closest to Jillie.
author: Melanie  James
